4.heading: Best, Rick.
4.title: Comics Buyer's Guide Video [videorecording] : news stories, film and home video from the collection of Alan L. Light.
4.author: [No author]
notes: 1 videocassette : col.
Available in Beta and VHS.

The history, format and purpose of the "Buyer's Guide for Comic Fandom" are discussed by Alan Light, Rick Best, Lavon Light, and Don and Maggie Thompson. Also included are scenes showing the production of the Buyer's Guide, a tour of a comics printing plant at Sparta, Ill., and interviews with Max Collins and Cat Yronwode. 1. Buyer's Guide for Comic Fandom. 2. Comic books, strips, etc.
